EmailTemplate.subject: Here is the download you requested.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for downloading Hello {{lead.First Name}}, Here is your consumer survey report, The importance of in-home Wi-Fi to your customers and your broadband business, to download.
An email has also been sent to the address you provided so that you can access this report from anywhere.
